notes.title: Conflicts of Interest
notes.p: “Laurence Thirion, Yannik Boehmann, Iban Corcostegui, Hervé Raoul and Xavier de Lamballerie declare no conflict of interest.” Remi N. Charrel has been consultant for Cepheid for matters not related with Flex cartridge tests included in this study, “The funders had no role in the design of the study; in the collection, analyses, or interpretation of data; in the writing of the manuscript, or in the decision to publish the results”.
